name: Celebi
author: Sumiyoshi Kizuki
flavor_text: When Celebi disappears deep in a forest, it is said to leave behind an egg it brought from the future.

attacks.name: Psychic Leaf
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads. Remove a number of damage counters from Celebi equal to the damage done to the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance). If Celebi has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.
